panels.description: Transaction volume over time grouped by swarmId, callId, and businessCode. Use this to spot traffic spikes and distribution changes across transaction groups.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  concat(
    swarmId,
    ' | ',
    if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId),
    ' | ',
    if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode)
  ) AS series,
  count() AS txns
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode
ORDER BY time, series

panels.title: Tx outcomes (count)

panels.description: p95 processor round-trip duration over time, grouped by swarmId, callId, and businessCode. Use this panel to monitor latency regressions in each transaction group.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  concat(
    swarmId,
    ' | ',
    if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId),
    ' | ',
    if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode)
  ) AS series,
  quantileTDigest(0.95)(processorDurationMs) AS p95_duration_ms
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode
ORDER BY time, series

panels.title: Processor duration p95 (ms)

panels.description: Processor success rate by swarmId, callId, and businessCode for the selected time range. Sorted by transaction volume for quick triage.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  swarmId,
  if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId) AS callId,
  if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) AS businessCode,
  count() AS txns,
  avg(processorSuccess) * 100 AS success_pct
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
GROUP BY swarmId, callId, businessCode
ORDER BY txns DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: Processor success by swarm/call/businessCode

panels.description: Business success rate by swarmId, callId, and businessCode for the selected time range. Compare with processor success to distinguish technical vs business failures.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  swarmId,
  if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId) AS callId,
  if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) AS businessCode,
  count() AS txns,
  avg(businessSuccess) * 100 AS success_pct
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
GROUP BY swarmId, callId, businessCode
ORDER BY txns DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: Business success by swarm/call/businessCode

panels.description: Top transaction groups by volume with latency and success metrics. Grouping is always swarmId + callId + businessCode.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  swarmId,
  if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId) AS callId,
  if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) AS businessCode,
  count() AS txns,
  avg(processorDurationMs) AS avg_duration_ms,
  quantileTDigest(0.95)(processorDurationMs) AS p95_duration_ms,
  avg(processorSuccess) * 100 AS processor_success_pct,
  avg(businessSuccess) * 100 AS business_success_pct
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
GROUP BY swarmId, callId, businessCode
ORDER BY txns DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: Top groups by swarm/call/businessCode

panels.description: Maximum processor duration per time bucket, grouped by swarmId, callId, and businessCode. This anomaly view highlights worst-case latency spikes.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  concat(
    swarmId,
    ' | ',
    if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId),
    ' | ',
    if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode)
  ) AS call,
  max(processorDurationMs) AS latency_max_ms
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode
ORDER BY time, call

panels.title: Latency max (ms) by callId-businessCode (interval)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) ORDER BY swarmId
list.label: Swarm
list.name: swarm
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) ORDER BY swarmId

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) AND callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 200
list.label: Call ID
list.name: callId
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) AND callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 200

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 200
list.label: Business Code
list.name: businessCode
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 200
